info.label: Editor at Omni Local
info.brief: Creative Editor and Writer looking to expand their domain knowledge and experience outside of local magazine publishing. I'm really interested in art, food, videogames and music and would love a chance to incorporate these passions into my work. I love what I do for a living in the publishing industry, however I am keen to explore other areas.

employment.summary: 6 years experience writing, editing and publishing. Currently working for a local magazine with a readership of 20,000. My work also involves data entry, social media management, website maintenance and general admin.

history.summary: 6 years experience writing, editing and publishing experience working for a local magazine with a readership of 20,000. My work also involves data entry, social media management, website maintenance and general admin.
highlights: Write, edit and publish Omni Local a magazine with a readership of 20,000
Won Apprentice of the Year award for work at Omni Local
Interviewed senior members of the coucil, including the Mayor of Kingston-upon-Thames
Co-organised a comedy festival in aide of charity
Created and grew social media presence for Omni Local via community engagement
Content creation and management for Omni Local Business Network which covers London, Surrey and more
Worked with marketing colleagues to sell and organise advertising in the magazine and website
Created marketing email newsletter for Omni Local Buisiness Network which covers London, Surrey and more

history.summary: Work experience at a major dental textbook publishing company
highlights: Data Entry for a major dental textbook publishing company
Helped coordinate the sending of advertising mail outs
General adminstration and office management duties

sets.name: Writing
skills: 6 years experience writing for a magazine with a readership of 20,000
Web Content writingfor a business networking website covering London, Surrey and more
Newsletter content creation for a business networking website covering London, Surrey and more
Social Media post writing and content creation

sets.name: Editing
skills: Proof Reading for a published magazine, web content and marketing campaign emails
Working with marketing colleagues to ensure their communications convey the correct tone for their audience
Working with advertising customers to ensure their messages reach their intended audience with maximum impact
Working closely with layout designer for a published magazine to ensure everythings ready to print
Liase with content creators to ensure the articles they contribute to the magazine meet our writing standards

sets.name: Administration
skills: Data Entry and analysis for business critical functions such as advertising revenue and customer relation management
Engaging with readers and advertisers via email and post to ensure the business runs smoothly
Chasing up contributors to ensure they submit their content in time for publishing

recognition.title: Apprentice of the year
recognition.summary: Awarded Apprentice of the year for my work at Omni Local.

interests.summary: I have an interest in video games and would like to turn my hobby into a profession by writing reviews for retro games
